description.long: Enhances the defense debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.DefenseDebuff.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into defense debuff powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and defense debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.DefenseDebuff.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into defense debuff powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into defense debuff powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the defense debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.DefenseDebuff.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into defense debuff powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into defense debuff powers that require a To Hit check.
Provides a chance to cause minor lethal damage to your targets.  This effect will trigger roughly 3.5 times per minute.
